item.title: Internships
item.description: Internships On the 3rd semester of the Master’s degree in Cognitive Science at Aarhus University, we go through an internship program. We have collected some of the experiences and outcomes here. Prior experiences Hedonia (Research group, Aarhus and Oxford) Name: Camilla Eva Andersen Contact: CamEvaAndersen@gmail.com How did you get your internship? I worked on a project in the same group as an RA. What was your ‘job role’? Researcher What did you end up doing/creating?
